mapper.select: SELECT cmt.serial serial,cmt.userId userId, cmt.content content, cmt.gSerial gSerial, cmt.pSerial pSerial, cmt.depth depth, cmt.indent indent, to_char(cmt.cDate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') cDate, cmt.isDelete isDelete, cmt.fSerial fSerial, mem.photo photo FROM DBOARD_COMMENT cmt JOIN DMEMBER mem ON cmt.userId = mem.userId WHERE cmt.fSerial = #{_parameter} AND cmt.isDelete = 0 ORDER BY cmt.gSerial asc, cmt.depth asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DBOARD_COMMENT (SERIAL, FSERIAL, DELFSERIAL, USERID, DELUSERID, ISDELETE, CONTENT, GSERIAL, PSERIAL, DEPTH, INDENT, CDATE) VALUES (SEQ_DBOARDCOMMENT.NEXTVAL, #{fSerial}, #{fSerial}, #{userId}, #{userId}, 0, #{content}, SEQ_DBOARDCOMMENT.CURRVAL, 0, 0, 0, SYSDATE)
